item.title: Establishing a Workflow for 2019 (and beyond)
item.description: What is a workflow? What I Currently Do Where in the world did these steps come from? Inspiration & Ideation Implementation, Analysis, & Presenting Cleaning & Reflecting A Workflow‚Äôs Role in Data Science For DataBased‚Äôs inaugural blog post (üéâ) I wanted to write about something that I always find myself thinking about when I work on or think about a new project: workflows!
